profile:
Welcome to INTEGRITY HVAC Solutions Inc.

INTEGRITY HVAC Solutions was established in 2020 when friends Steven Cormier (Moncton) and Wayne LeBlanc (Saint John) left their HVAC jobs to combine their 15+ years of experience and provide a better, more honest customer service experience. Their love for personal interaction is the reason our team strives to connect with people, creating relationships and trust with our customers. Free of limitations, they set the standard of going above and beyond for every customer. We know the importance of taking responsibility for our work, and constantly seek every opportunity to grow, aknowledging that no matter our confidence, there is always room for improvement. Leading a small team means every team member understands and shares the companys values and provides them with the personal satisfaction of a job well done.



We take pride in our work, and are constantly reminded of our #1 goal, having INTEGRITY, because without it, we'd just be another company!


We're social here:
https://www.facebook.com/HeatPumpIntegrity
https://www.integrityhvacs.com/#
